Articles.Content: Does anyone know about ore concentrations underwater or by the shore?
Hi kavi, there's no ore water in stock KSP, shore ore will vary with every new game :)
I believe underwater, there is no ore. For shores, it varies (as sal pointed out). Though I think the shores tend to be fairly poor concentration.
The overlay shown by scanning has some colour over areas of water near the shore. I must go check out whether these areas have any ore or if it's just the colour bleeding over.
